question: 甲、乙两位火炬手负责把火炬从$$A$$地传递到$$B$$地．先由甲从$$A$$地出发，并在途中将火炬传递给乙；乙接过火炬后继续慢跑前往$$B$$地．已知$$A$$、$$B$$两地相距$$2400$$米，并且甲比乙多跑了$$600$$米．请问：甲跑了多少米？（ ）
translated_question: A and B are two torchbearers responsible for carrying a torch from point A to point B. First, athlete A runs from point A and passes the torch to athlete B; then, athlete B continues to jog to point B. The distance between points A and B is $$2400$$ meters, and athlete A runs $$600$$ meters more than athlete B. How many meters did athlete A run?

question: 有甲、乙两堆棋子，其中甲堆棋子多于乙堆．现在按如下方法移动棋子：第一次从甲堆中拿出和乙堆一样多的棋子放到乙堆；第二次从乙堆中拿出和甲堆剩下的同样多的棋子放到甲堆；第三次又从甲堆中拿出和乙堆剩下的同样多的棋子放到乙堆．照此移法，移动完三次后，甲、乙两堆棋子数恰好都是$$32$$个．问甲、乙两堆棋子原来各有多少个？甲：个乙：个
translated_question: There are two piles of chess pieces, pile A and pile B. Pile A has more pieces than pile B. Now, the pieces are moved according to the following method: First, take the same number of pieces from pile A as there are in pile B and put them into pile B. Second, take the same number of pieces from pile B as there are in pile A after the first move and put them into pile A. Third, take the same number of pieces from pile A as there are in pile B after the second move and put them into pile B. After moving three times, the number of pieces in both piles A and B is $$32$$. How many pieces were there in piles A and B originally?

question: 东东今年$$10$$岁，爸爸妈妈的年龄和是$$80$$岁，那么年后他们三人的年龄和是$$120$$岁．
translated_question: Dong Dong is $$10$$ years old this year, and the sum of his parents' ages is $$80$$ years. How many years later will the sum of their ages be $$120$$?

question:
善良的公主被邪恶的女巫追到了魔法森林深处，在一个三岔路口，每一个路口都写着一句话．
第一个路口：“这条路能通往你的城堡．”
第二个路口：“第一个路口不能通往你的城堡．”
第三个路口：“这条路不能通往你的城堡．”
女巫就要追来了，三句话只有一句真话，也只有一条路能让公主回到城堡，公主该选择第个路口．（填写数字）
translated_question: The princess is being chased by a wicked witch into a magic forest. At a three-way junction, each path has a statement written on it. The first path says, “This path leads to your castle.” The second path says, “The first path does not lead to your castle.” The third path says, “This path does not lead to your castle.” The witch is almost here, and only one of the three statements is true, and only one path leads back to the castle. Which path should the princess choose? (Fill in the number)

question: 博士的生日日期是$$10$$月$$23$$日，已知$$2018$$年$$9$$月$$1$$日是星期六，那么博士$$2019$$年生日在星期．（填数字）

question:

The number of tents in each row is shown on the right, and the number of tents in each column is shown on the bottom. Is there a tent in row $$5$$, column $$3$$?
